explains: adj. 变成粉末的；涂粉的
v. 使成粉末（powder 的过去分词）；撒粉；搽粉
wordGroup: powdered ore 粉碎矿石；粉状矿

sentences.en: She powdered her face and put on her lipstick.
sentences.cn: 她往脸上搽了粉，又涂上了口红。

sentences.en: There are only two boxes of powdered milk left.
She powdered her face and applied her lipstick and rouge.
sentences.cn: 她往脸上搽了粉，又涂了她的口红和胭脂。
